title: Audit Trail
test_description: Audit Trail validation - Refresh operations found in audit trail. Queries system.query.history for REFRESH operations with execution status FINISHED.

api_calls.name: query_audit_trail

payload.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) as total_queries FROM system.query.history WHERE execution_status = 'FINISHED' AND timestamp > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) LIMIT 1

api_calls.post_processing: function processStep(responseData, currentVariables) { const dataArray = responseData?.result?.data_array || []; const schema = responseData?.manifest?.schema?.columns || []; if (dataArray && dataArray.length > 0 && schema.length > 0) { const row = dataArray[0]; const totalQueries = row[schema.findIndex(col => col.name === 'total_queries')] || 0; return { ...currentVariables, total_queries: totalQueries }; } return { ...currentVariables, total_queries: 0 }; }

parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const auditStep = stepResults.query_audit_trail; const expected_result = 'Audit trail accessible'; let actual_result = 'Audit trail not accessible'; if (auditStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'Failed to execute audit trail query', code: 'AUDIT_TRAIL_ERROR', test_id: 'OQ-103-1', title: 'Audit Trail', expected_result, actual_result }; } const totalQueries = variables.total_queries || 0; if (totalQueries > 0) { actual_result = `Found ${totalQueries} queries in last 7 days`; return { status: 'pass', message: actual_result, code: 'AUDIT_TRAIL_ACCESSIBLE', test_id: 'OQ-103-1', title: 'Audit Trail', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { actual_result = 'No recent queries found in audit trail'; return { status: 'fail', message: actual_result, code: 'AUDIT_TRAIL_EMPTY', test_id: 'OQ-103-1', title: 'Audit Trail', expected_result, actual_result }; } }
